EmailTemplate.subject: Start Your Cloud-Native Journey with Pivotal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
It was great to meet you at the Cloud Foundry Summit. Thank you for stopping by the Pivotal booth.
Pivotal partners with customers to overcome challenges associated with lengthy enterprise IT cycles. We help these organizations use a new approach to software. With a proven portfolio <[[https://pivotal.io/products?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cf-summit-2017]]> of methodologies, a powerful platform, and open-source data and analytics software, we can help you transform the way you build and deliver software. Make IT a business enabler rather than a cost center!
Until we meet again, here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/cloud-foundry-summit-2017?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cf-summit-2017]]> are some resources to start you on your journey:
Take advantage of our additional online resources to learn more about cloud-native patterns <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cf-summit-2017]]>, microservices architectures <[[https://pivotal.io/microservices?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cf-summit-2017]]>, and Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cf-summit-2017]]>.
Now is the time to take the reins of your digital transformation. Letâ€™s build something meaningful!
